summary:
Moldova is a small landlocked country in Eastern Europe, bordering Romania and Ukraine. It has a long history, once part of the Principality of Moldavia, and later under Russian and Romanian rule. It gained independence from the Soviet Union in 1991 and became the Republic of Moldova. 

The country has a capital, Chișinău, and is led by a president and prime minister. Moldova is working to join the European Union and is known for its service-based economy. It faces challenges as one of Europe's poorest countries and has a relatively low Human Development Index. Moldova is a member of many international organizations.
title: Moldova
